content:
A $50 Grubhub gift card is a thoughtful and practical gift that will surely be appreciated by Sarah and her family. It's perfect for trying out different restaurants and cuisines, including their favorite Chinese food.

I'm so glad I could help you with ideas and suggestions for the gift basket. It's wonderful that you're taking the time to celebrate Lily's adoption and show your love and support for her family.

Remember to include a heartfelt note with the gift basket, expressing your love and congratulations to Sarah and her family. It's a special way to make the gift even more personal and meaningful.

Here's a sample note idea:

"Dear Sarah, [Husband's Name], and Lily,

I'm beyond thrilled to welcome Lily to your family! As you begin this new chapter together, I want you to know how much I care and am here to support you all. This gift basket is just a small token of my love and celebration for your new addition.

The personalized blanket and books are meant to be special reminders of Lily's adoption journey and her Chinese heritage. The Grubhub gift card is a practical way to enjoy some delicious meals together as a family.

Please know that I'm here for you, and I'm so excited to watch Lily grow and thrive. Congratulations again on your beautiful daughter!

With love and best wishes, [Your Name]"

Feel free to modify it to fit your personal style and relationship with Sarah and her family.

I hope this helps, and I'm sure Sarah and her family will appreciate your thoughtful gift.
